fab.title: Add your transactions
fab.description: Tap this button to quickly record an expense or income.

batchEntry.title: AI-powered entry
batchEntry.description: You can also add multiple transactions by voice, photo, or text using artificial intelligence.

monthSelector.title: Navigate between months
monthSelector.description: Use the arrows to view your transactions from other months.

balanceCard.title: Your monthly balance
balanceCard.description: See how much you've earned and spent. Tap income or expenses to filter.

transactionList.title: Your transactions
transactionList.description: Tap any transaction to edit or delete it.

bottomBar.title: Explore the app
bottomBar.description: Navigate between Home, Budget, Stats and Settings.

donutChart.title: Expenses by category
donutChart.description: Visualize how your expenses are distributed across categories.

quickCards.title: Quick summary
quickCards.description: Key statistics about your financial habits this month.

typeSelector.title: Transaction type
typeSelector.description: Choose whether it's an expense or income.

amountInput.title: Amount
amountInput.description: Enter how much you spent or received.

categoryPicker.title: Category
categoryPicker.description: Select a category to organize your transactions.

schedule.title: Recurring transactions
schedule.description: Schedule expenses or income that repeat. Tap here to configure the frequency.

header.title: Batch summary
header.description: Here you can see the total of the records the AI found.

cards.title: Review and edit
cards.description: Tap the description, category, or amount of any record to edit it.

actions.title: Save or cancel
actions.description: When you're ready, tap Save to add all transactions or Cancel to discard them.

frequency.title: Choose the frequency
frequency.description: Select how often it repeats: daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly.

info.title: Summary and save
info.description: Here you can see a summary of the schedule. When you're ready, tap Save.

filters.title: Filter your transactions
filters.description: Use these filters to search by date, type, status, category, amount, or recurrence.

sort.title: Sort the results
sort.description: Tap here to change the order: newest, oldest, highest amount, or lowest amount.

banner.title: Scheduled transactions
banner.description: These are virtual transactions that will be automatically registered on their scheduled date. You can also tap 'Review' to register them manually.

projection.title: Projection
projection.description: Use this button to show or hide future records that will be automatically created by your scheduled transactions.

tabs.title: Expenses and income
tabs.description: Your categories are organized by type. Use these tabs to view expense or income categories.

groups.title: Category groups
groups.description: Organize your categories into groups for better budget control.

add.title: Create categories
add.description: Tap here to create a new custom category with its own icon and color.

info.title: Scheduled transactions
info.description: Here you can view and manage all your active and inactive recurring transactions.

fab.title: Add a schedule
fab.description: To add a new one, create a regular transaction and enable the 'Schedule' option before saving.
